languages.text: {n}Вас отвлекает встревоженный голос в воксе.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, прием! Пилот шаттла доложил об операции по спасению, блюстители уже в пути. Каков ваш статус? Вы живы? Ответьте!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Вас отвлекает громкое шипение в воксе.{/n} "Лорд... докладываю: ваш связной не вых... на связь.... удостовериться, что с вами... в порядке. Ожидаем вас... доставить на флагман. Подтвердите, что... живы и слышите нас. Прием".

languages.text: {n}You are interrupted by an anxious voice from the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, do you read? The shuttle pilot reported the rescue operation. Enforcers are on their way. What is your status? Are you alive? Come in!"
languages.original_text: {n}Вас отвлекает встревоженный голос в воксе.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, прием! Пилот шаттла доложил об операции по спасению, блюстители уже в пути. Каков ваш статус? Вы живы? Ответьте!"

traits.locale_text: {n}You are interrupted by an anxious voice from the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, do you read? The shuttle pilot reported the rescue operation. Enforcers are on their way. What is your status? Are you alive? Come in!"

{n}A loud hiss of the vox distracts you.{/n} "Lord— reporting: your comms off— is not respon— confirm that you— all right. We're expecting your— to the flagship. Please confirm— alive and can hear us. Over."

{n}You are interrupted by an anxious voice from the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, do you read? The shuttle pilot reported the rescue operation. Enforcers are on their way. What is your status? Are you alive? Come in!"

{n}You are interrupted by a loud hiss from the vox:{/n} "Lord— reporting: your comms off— is not respon— confirm that you— all right. We're expecting your— to the flagship. Please confirm— alive and can hear us. Over."

{n}You are interrupted by an anxious voice from the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, do you read? The shuttle pilot reported the rescue operation. Enforcers are on their way. What is your status? Are you alive? Come in!"

{n}You are interrupted by an anxious voice from the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, do you read? The shuttle pilot reported the rescue operation. Enforcers are on their way. What is your status? Are you alive? Come in!"

{n}You are interrupted by an anxious voice from the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, do you read? The shuttle pilot reported the rescue operation. Enforcers are on their way. What is your status? Are you alive? Come in!"

languages.text: {n}这时，你的音阵装置里传来了焦急的声音。{/n}“舰长大人，能听到吗？穿梭机驾驶员报告说需要救援，执法者已经赶过去了。您现在情况如何？您还活着吗？请回话！”
languages.original_text: {n}You are interrupted by an anxious voice from the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, do you read? The shuttle pilot reported the rescue operation. Enforcers are on their way. What is your status? Are you alive? Come in!"

traits.locale_text: {n}这时，你的音阵装置里传来了焦急的声音。{/n}“舰长大人，能听到吗？穿梭机驾驶员报告说需要救援，执法者已经赶过去了。您现在情况如何？您还活着吗？请回话！”

languages.text: {n}ヴォクスからの不安げな声に遮られた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、聞こえますか？シャトルパイロットが救出作戦を報告しました。執行官たちが向かっています。そちらの状況は？ご無事ですか？応答してください！」
languages.original_text: {n}You are interrupted by an anxious voice from the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, do you read? The shuttle pilot reported the rescue operation. Enforcers are on their way. What is your status? Are you alive? Come in!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクスからの不安げな声に遮られた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、聞こえますか？シャトルパイロットが救出作戦を報告しました。執行官たちが向かっています。そちらの状況は？ご無事ですか？応答してください！」

languages.text: {n}Una voz ansiosa te interrumpe a través del vocotransmisor:{/n} «Lord Capitán, ¿me recibe? El piloto de la lanzadera ha informado de la operación de rescate. Los guardias van de camino. ¿Cuál es su situación? ¿Sigue con vida? ¡Cambio!».
languages.original_text: {n}You are interrupted by an anxious voice from the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, do you read? The shuttle pilot reported the rescue operation. Enforcers are on their way. What is your status? Are you alive? Come in!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Una voz ansiosa te interrumpe a través del vocotransmisor:{/n} «Lord Capitán, ¿me recibe? El piloto de la lanzadera ha informado de la operación de rescate. Los guardias van de camino. ¿Cuál es su situación? ¿Sigue con vida? ¡Cambio!».

languages.text: {n}Vokstan gelen endişeli bir ses, sözünü kesiyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, beni duyuyor musunuz? Mekiğin pilotu, kurtarma operasyonu yapıldığını bildirdi. İnfazcılar yolda. Durumunuz nedir? Hayatta mısınız? Cevap verin!"
languages.original_text: {n}You are interrupted by an anxious voice from the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, do you read? The shuttle pilot reported the rescue operation. Enforcers are on their way. What is your status? Are you alive? Come in!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vokstan gelen endişeli bir ses, sözünü kesiyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, beni duyuyor musunuz? Mekiğin pilotu, kurtarma operasyonu yapıldığını bildirdi. İnfazcılar yolda. Durumunuz nedir? Hayatta mısınız? Cevap verin!"

languages.text: {n}Une voix angoissée vous interrompt en s'échappant du vox :{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, vous m'entendez ? Le pilote de la navette a signalé les opérations de sauvetage. Des prévôts sont en route. Où en êtes-vous ? Êtes-vous en vie ? Répondez ! »
languages.original_text: {n}You are interrupted by an anxious voice from the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, do you read? The shuttle pilot reported the rescue operation. Enforcers are on their way. What is your status? Are you alive? Come in!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Une voix angoissée vous interrompt en s'échappant du vox :{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, vous m'entendez ? Le pilote de la navette a signalé les opérations de sauvetage. Des prévôts sont en route. Où en êtes-vous ? Êtes-vous en vie ? Répondez ! »

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich ertönt eine nervöse Stimme aus dem Vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, hört Ihr mich? Der Shuttle-Pilot hat die Rettungsoperation gemeldet. Enforcers sind unterwegs. Wie ist Euer Status? Seid Ihr am Leben? Bitte kommen!"
languages.original_text: {n}You are interrupted by an anxious voice from the vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, do you read? The shuttle pilot reported the rescue operation. Enforcers are on their way. What is your status? Are you alive? Come in!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Plötzlich ertönt eine nervöse Stimme aus dem Vox:{/n} "Lord Captain, hört Ihr mich? Der Shuttle-Pilot hat die Rettungsoperation gemeldet. Enforcers sind unterwegs. Wie ist Euer Status? Seid Ihr am Leben? Bitte kommen!"
